coupon_text: (If you haven’t redeemed this one before). Free Shiseido samples from their range of skincare products.Follow the Get offer button and enter in your age. It’ll then give you Shiseido product recommendations according to your age. You will be able to order 2x free samples.The Shiseido skincare sample options are: ULTIMUNE POWER INFUSING CONCENTRATE Serum, ESSENTIAL ENERGY HYDRATING DAY CREAM, BENEFIANCE WRINKLE SMOOTHING CREAM and VITAL PERFECTION UPLIFTING AND FIRMING EYE CREAM. You will be recommended 2 of these products according to your age group and will be order free samples.You need to be over 16. Estimated delivery within 2 weeks. There’s a limit of 1 submission per household.
